Name: Apicurio
Text: Oh, hi, I'm here on behalf of the queen; your name is Handarth, right?

Name: Apicurio
Text: Cool, great . . . it says here you've been 'extracting the magic from others and leaving them as lifeless husks,' would you know anything about that?

Name: Apicurio
Text: Right, right . . . okay, so, I guess I have to beat you up now? To stop you?

Name: Apicurio
Text: Fantastic, great, wonderful, time to fight now!
